Retry Japanese words Downloading dictionary file… Populating Database… Kanji Reading Definition Definitions Entry Search History About Settings Lookup words \"%1$s\" is not a valid query No results found for \"%1$s\" TIP: try using for more results. Words Sentences Other forms Grade: Strokes: Kun: On: No enough available space. You need at least 400 MB of available space to download dictionary files. Setup Progress Shows the progress of the setup task to the user Running setup search widget Reset Rebuild DB Rebuild database Are you sure you want to re-download all dictionary files and rebuild the database? This operation may take several minutes and use a significant amount of bandwidth. Yes No Close Help To begin, it is necessary to download dictionary files and build the database. Please notice that this might take several minutes and use a significant amount of bandwidth. Start download Establishing connection with server… Search dictionary entries.\n Input any Japanese or English text to begin. Search example sentences translated to English.\n Input any Japanese or English text to begin. Add dictionary entries to your list.\n Input any Japanese or English text to begin. Add example sentences to your list.\n Input any Japanese or English text to begin. Welcome to OpenJisho! Lookup sentences // About

OpenJisho is free and open source software. It is licensed under the GNU Public License (GPL) version 3. You can view the license here https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.en.html.

This program uses the JMdict/EDICT, RADKFILE and KANJIDIC dictionary files. These files are the property of the Electronic Dictionary Research and Development Group, and are used in conformance with the Group\'s licence.

Example sentences are provided by Tatoeba under the Creative Commons Attribution 2.0 France license.

Illustrations provided by Ambar Troya, all rights reserved. The illustrations cannot be reproduced in any form, without permission. LEARN MORE.

Add item My lists New list List name Create new list \'/\' is not allowed A list with this name already exists. Failed to create list Name can\'t be empty New search Edit List updated Undo No items selected Item removed Failed to load lists List deleted Selection deleted You have no lists.\n Lists let you save entries in a convenient way. Press the floating button below to begin. You have no items in this list.\n Lists can contain dictionary entries, example sentences or arbitrary text. Press the floating button below to begin. Entries Delete Text entry Search any Japanese, kanji, hiragana or English text Swipe between tabs to see matching dictionary entries and example sentences. Internet connection is not required. Wildcards are supported for search The \'_\' wildcard matches a single character, while the \'*\' and \'%\' characters match any sequence of zero or more characters. View your search history Click the history floating button to browse previous searches. Lookup kanji by radicals Click the radicals button to search kanji by radicals and add them to your query. Create study lists Save lists with any dictionary entries, example sentences or text notes. skip Selected radicals: Search kanji by radicals.\nChoose any radicals below to list the kanji that contains all of them.
